titleStmt.title: Good nevvs: or, Wine and oyle poured into the wounds of sinning and distressed Jacob. In some meditations in Isa. 27. 6, 7, 8, & 9, verses. Directing to the cause wherefore and the end for which the present affliction is come upon him. Hinting at the means by which his deliverance will be wrought. And comforting him against the extremity of affliction, come and coming upon him. By Pain Lumle a Welch christian.
titleStmt.author: Lumley, Pain.

notesStmt.note: The words "cause .. for which" are bracketed together on title page.
Reproduction of the original in the Congregational Library, London.
